specials_info:
An old man gives you this riddle in order to pass:

 Once man alive 
 Now living death 
 It drinketh blood 
 N' stealeth breath.

 Answer: VAMPIRE.
 Wrong: Battle vs. [1 Master Sorcerer]

Magic Mouth Riddle:

 Past warscapes fought by men long dead,
 and treasures lost on bloodied fields,
 the One God lifts his thorn-crowned head,
 and lays a strength on friendly..

Answer: SHIELDS
 Item: YBARRASHIELD
